hero.title: WAOC is a long-term effort to restore trust, coordination, and human connection.
hero.subtitle: Through transparent and verifiable on-chain systems.

participants.title: Participants
participants.desc: Learn how individuals can participate in and contribute to the WAOC network.

builders.title: Builders
builders.desc: Explore how developers and collaborators can build with WAOC’s open infrastructure.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Discover how collective governance and coordination take shape within WAOC.

why.title: Why WAOC exists
why.p1: WAOC is not defined by a single asset or application. It represents a long-term effort to restore trust, coordination, and connection in an increasingly fragmented world.
why.p2: By using transparent and verifiable on-chain systems as a foundation, WAOC seeks to align technology with human values — enabling cooperation, mutual understanding, and a shared sense of responsibility over time.

network.title: WAOC Network
network.desc: A public on-chain layer designed to support trust, coordination, and collective participation.

identity.title: Genesis & Identity
identity.desc: A historical and symbolic layer representing origin, participation, and continuity.

practice.title: Practice & Mindfulness
practice.desc: Tools and practices that support reflection, awareness, and long-term alignment.

verify.title: Verify before you participate
verify.lead: Always verify official contracts and links before taking action.
verify.notice: WAOC will never contact you privately or ask for seed phrases or private keys.

getStarted.title: Get started with WAOC
getStarted.intro: Start by understanding the foundations of WAOC, verifying official resources, and exploring how you can participate responsibly.

docs.title: Read the documentation
docs.desc: Learn about WAOC’s philosophy, structure, and on-chain principles.

verify.title: Verify official resources
verify.desc: Confirm official contracts, links, and announcements before taking any action.

token.title: WAOC Token
token.desc: Understand the role of the WAOC token and its place within the ecosystem.

nft.title: Genesis & Identity
nft.desc: Explore the symbolic origin of WAOC through its Genesis NFT and identity layer.

meditation.title: Practice & Mindfulness
meditation.desc: Use tools designed to support awareness, reflection, and long-term alignment.

footer.disclaimer: This site does not constitute financial advice.
